Articles.Content:
![i2H3ApF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/i2H3ApF.jpg)

**T-34 Family**

**Designer: Zekes**

**Status:****COMPLETED**

**The T-34 was one of the most widely produced armored vehicles in the modern world. Here are the three most produced versions, in KSP replica: T-34 1940, T-34 1942, and T-34-85.**

**All Three come with rotating turret (just decouple from the body and switch to it). Make sure to use forward-facing docking ports to "control from here", since the control pods are often the wrong way around. Automatically set to have the middle three wheels non-operationall to allow high-speed turning. Camoflage not included.**

***Download (RAR):*** [https://www./?vbz71kaw8h10m7u](https://www./?vbz71kaw8h10m7u)

***Download (Individual):***

***T-34 1940:*** [http://www./download/2g48anb9kxyfwv9/T-34+1940.craft](http://www./download/2g48anb9kxyfwv9/T-34+1940.craft)

***T-34 1942:*** [http://www./download/u0oipf48dbz02a5/T-34+1942.craft](http://www./download/u0oipf48dbz02a5/T-34+1942.craft)

***T-34-85:*** [http://www./download/joyo8tl768ornuk/T-34-85.craft](http://www./download/joyo8tl768ornuk/T-34-85.craft)
